metadata.name: Sultanahmet and Hagia Sophia in Green and Blue #1
metadata.description:
Art is the only hope for humanity and peace because within itself it consists of pure love and beautyâ€¦

_Neon Istanbul_ is a new collection of physical art and accompanying NFTs by Devrim Erbil, one of the most important living representatives of Turkish Contemporary art. Compositions in the collection use vivid colors to depict iconic views in and around Istanbul, Turkey.

Visit the project on the web at [RenkoLondon.com/nfts](https://renkolondon.com/nfts/).
